name: ExerciseRecommender
0:
”Alexa, ask exercise recommendation to recommend me an exercise at home”
”Alexa, ask exercise recommendation to tell me an exercise”
”Alexa, ask exercise recommendation to recommend me today's exercise”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: exercise recommendation
des: Daily exercises could be beneficial to keep ourselves fit in an enthusiastic manner. Generally, exercise is a challenging for people especially at home. When Alexa app says the today's exercise randomly, this could motivate us to do the exercise.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
